flavorText: They look tasty, but best to plant them.

foreignData.flavorText: Sie sehen schmackhaft aus, aber wir sollten sie besser einpflanzen.
foreignData.name: Riesen-Gelegenheit
foreignData.text: Du kannst zwei Speisen opfern. Falls du dies tust, erzeuge einen 7/7 grünen Riese-Kreaturenspielstein. Andernfalls erzeuge drei Speise-Spielsteine. (Sie sind Artefakte mit „{2}, {T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.")

foreignData.flavorText: Son apetitosas, pero es mejor plantarlas.
foreignData.name: Oportunidad gigantesca
foreignData.text: Puedes sacrificar dos Comidas. Si lo haces, crea una ficha de criatura Gigante verde 7/7. De lo contrario, crea tres fichas de Comida. (Son artefactos con "{2}, {T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Ganas 3 vidas".)

foreignData.flavorText: Ils ont l'air bons, mais mieux vaut les planter.
foreignData.name: Opportunité de taille
foreignData.text: Vous pouvez sacrifier deux nourritures. Si vous faites ainsi, créez un jeton de créature 7/7 verte Géant. Sinon, créez trois jetons Nourriture. (Ce sont des artefacts avec « {2}, {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Vous gagnez 3 points de vie. »)

foreignData.flavorText: Sembrano gustosi, ma è meglio piantarli.
foreignData.name: Opportunità Gigantesca
foreignData.text: Puoi sacrificare due Cibi. Se lo fai, crea una pedina creatura Gigante 7/7 verde. Altrimenti, crea tre pedine Cibo. (Sono artefatti con "{2}, {T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Guadagni 3 punti vita".)

foreignData.flavorText: 美味しそうに見えるが、植えるのが一番だ。
foreignData.name: 巨大な好機
foreignData.text: あなたは食物２つを生け贄に捧げてもよい。そうしたなら、緑の７/７の巨人・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。そうしなかったなら、食物・トークンを３つ生成する。（それらは、「{2}, {T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたは３点のライフを得る。」を持つアーティファクトである。）

foreignData.flavorText: 맛있어 보이겠지만, 심는 게 잘하는 일이다.
foreignData.name: 거대한 기회
foreignData.text: 당신은 음식 두 개를 희생할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 7/7 녹색 거인 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다. 그렇지 않으면, 음식 토큰 세 개를 만든다. (그 토큰들은 "{2}, {T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 당신은 생명 3점을 얻는다."를 가진 마법물체들이다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Eles parecem saborosos, mas é melhor plantar.
foreignData.name: Oportunidade Gigante
foreignData.text: Você pode sacrificar duas Comidas. Se fizer isso, crie uma ficha de criatura verde 7/7 do tipo Gigante. Se não fizer isso, crie três fichas de Comida. (Elas são artefatos com "{2}, {T}, sacrifique este artefato: Você ganha 3 pontos de vida.")

foreignData.flavorText: Выглядят они аппетитно, но лучше их посадить.
foreignData.name: Гигантская Возможность
foreignData.text: Вы можете пожертвовать две Еды. Если вы это делаете, создайте одну фишку существа 7/7 зеленый Гигант. В противном случае создайте три фишки Еды. (Они являются артефактами со способностью «{2}, {T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: вы получаете 3 жизни».)

foreignData.flavorText: 虽然看着挺好吃，但最好还是拿去种。
foreignData.name: 伟大机遇
foreignData.text: 你可以牺牲两个食品。如果你如此作，则派出一个7/7绿色巨人衍生生物。若否，则派出三个食品衍生物。（食品衍生物是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

foreignData.flavorText: 雖然看著挺好吃，但最好還是拿去種。
foreignData.name: 偉大機遇
foreignData.text: 你可以犧牲兩個食品。如果你如此作，則派出一個7/7綠色巨人衍生生物。若否，則派出三個食品衍生物。（食品衍生物是具有「{2}，{T}，犧牲此神器：你獲得3點生命」的神器。）

name: Giant Opportunity
originalText: You may sacrifice two Foods. If you do, create a 7/7 green Giant creature token. Otherwise, create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

rulings.text: You choose whether to sacrifice two Foods as Giant Opportunity resolves, not as you cast it.
You can't sacrifice more than two Foods to create more than one Giant token.
If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Gingerbrute to activate the last ability of Tempting Witch.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures (such as Gingerbrute), it's never a creature type.
You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the ability of Tempting Witch.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.

text: You may sacrifice two Foods. If you do, create a 7/7 green Giant creature token. Otherwise, create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
